What if a 🐵, who was so chivalrous that it became a nobleman, served a 🐐 who was so generous that it became a queen?
#Nobleman=#Queen

There was a long tradition of service in the 🐵's family tree.
#Nobleman=#Queen

🐵💁🍽🐐 (or: 🐵 served 🐐)
So at first, the chivalrous 🐵 was a loyal servant to the generous 🐐.

🐵🙂✨🐐😴🆒 (or: 🐵 was underappreciated by 🐐)
But the 🐐 failed to appreciate the 🐵.

🐵🕵📤😈🐐 (or: 🐵 stole from 🐐)
So the 🐵 pocketed the 🐐's money.

🐐💬🐵 (or: 🐵 was reported by 🐐)
Then the 🐐 reported the 🐵 to the police.

🐵🙇🙏😭🐐 (or: 🐵 begged forgiveness from 🐐)
So the 🐵 pleaded with the 🐐 for forgiveness.

🐐🤐👐🐵 (or: 🐵 was subjugated by 🐐)
But the 🐐's subjugation of the 🐵 was complete.

🐵👺📢🤐🐐🔗 (or: 🐵 was enslaved by 🐐)
So the 🐐 treated the 🐵 like a personal slave.
